channel.title: Devops on WyNotes
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on WyNotes

item.title: Terraform
item.description: Terraform Install Mac? brew install terraform Basic Usage Sample Backend terraform { backend "s3" { bucket = "terraform-core-lle-state" key = "A/UNIQUE/KEY" region = "us-east-1" dynamodb_table = "terraform-lock" } } The key is the S3 key, that is the path to the file.

item.title: Git
item.description: Git Git CLI commands Initial repository setup Branches Git Config Remotes Tag Commit Git CLI commands Basic git flow commands # see current branch and file status git status # add commits to staging git add .
